channel.title: Iron Sights
channel.description:
(Ehem some stupid monkey just locked my thread in the cafeteria section. Good community here I can tell.)
Why is it that there are still games without iron sights? I don't mean shitty games like TF2 since that is for kids anyways but I mean BM and L4D2 don't have iron sights. Why? Every game should have this awesome feature for reasons I already stated.

item.title: Iron Sights
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
RealitySucksBadly:

(Ehem some stupid monkey just locked my thread in the cafeteria section. Good community here I can tell.)

Why is it that there are still games without iron sights? I don’t mean shitty games like TF2 since that is for kids anyways but I mean BM and L4D2 don’t have iron sights. Why? Every game should have this awesome feature for reasons I already stated.

That monkey is a mini god to some of us here RealitySucksBadly coughacristoff2cough. I would suggest you take a look at the faq thread, the ask a question thread, the make a suggestion thread and perhaps even the wiki before posting again.

Three strikes may take you and your ghost accounts out.

Read full topic

item.title: Iron Sights
item.dc:creator: trance
item.description:
Also, you called TF2 shitty but not L4D2. What’s up with that?

L4D2 was a money grab, TF2 is a solid game that is constantly being worked on and updated.

Read full topic

item.title: Iron Sights
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
hmm. which one are you… Iso? MGA?

your making coherent sentences and don’t appear to be drooling or dragging your knuckles so I’m going to say NOT iso.

unless of course your a new eight year old that’s snuck onto daddy’s computer.

item.title: Iron Sights
item.dc:creator: Trigger_Proximity
item.description:
Ok Reality. You aren’t trolling as such other than your insult to rabid. In which case: troll.
Otherwise this has already been discussed. The answer is no. No IronSights. Please use the Search Feature. If a thread is locked, don’t argue. It was locked for a reason.

Read full topic
